welcome.title: Welcome to Zero Poofs
welcome.subtitle: Your journey to a smoke-free life starts here
welcome.description: Join thousands of people who have successfully quit smoking with our proven approach.

setup.title: Let's get to know you
setup.subtitle: This helps us personalize your experience
setup.privacyText: Don't worry, your data is secure. We keep it private and won't pass it on.

dailyAmount.label: What's your daily usage?
dailyAmount.modalTitle: How many cigarettes a day is normal for you?

packPrice.label: What's the cost of one unit?
packPrice.modalTitle: How much do you spend on smoking?

buddySelection.title: Choose your buddy
buddySelection.subtitle: Pick a companion for your journey

notificationPermission.title: Stay motivated
notificationPermission.subtitle: Get gentle reminders and celebrate your progress

challengeStart.mainSubtitle: Your smoke-free journey begins now. Let's make it count!

shop.description: A wonderful companion for your journey to quit smoking.
shop.sceneDescription: A beautiful background to enhance your quit smoking journey.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.subtitle: Exclusive achievements are under construction
comingSoon.description: We're working hard to bring you amazing exclusive achievements. Stay tuned for updates!

achievements.locked: Locked. Update your plan to unlock this achievement.
achievements.waitForLevel: Wait. Reach the required level to unlock this achievement.
